rules_text:
When Suncleaver Minotaur enters the battlefield, each opponent sacrifices a nontoken creature or enchantment.
[i]Skullkeeping[/i] – Whenever Suncleaver Minotaur attacks, exile a creature card from your graveyard and put a skull counter on it. Then if you own five or more cards in exile with skull counters on them, each opponent sacrifices a nontoken creature or enchantment.
